sentences: Ray Smith (June 25, 1918 â€“ December 4, 1979) was an American country music artist.
Born in Glendale, California, Smith began playing guitar at age eight.
He joined a traveling rodeo show as a musician, and then took a job performing for radio station WMCA in New York City.
He performed locally with a trio in New York, and also worked in Boston on WCOP's Hayloft Jamboree.
While in New York he was offered a contract recording with Columbia Records, and went on to record for London, and Coral as well.
He also appeared on Dumont Television.
